title: Apple Ventures into Generative AI: Negotiations Underway for News Archives Access
description: In a recent development reported by The New York Times, technology giant Apple is making strides in the field of generative AI, aiming to secure access to major publishers’ news archives for training purposes. Despite the notable absence of Apple in the generative AI arena, the company is reportedly in negotiations with key publishers and […]

title: AI Image Dataset Controversy: Child Sexual Abuse Material Raises Alarms
description: In a recent revelation, the Stanford Internet Observatory has uncovered a disconcerting reality within the realm of artificial intelligence (AI) development. The largest image dataset employed for training AI image generation models, LAION-5B, has been found to contain 3,226 images suspected to be child sexual abuse material (CSAM). This revelation has prompted LAION to swiftly […]

title: UN Embraces Blockchain: Utilizing ZK-Proofs and Decentralized IDs for Refugee Safety â€“ IOTA Offers the Same Tech But Better
description: The UNHCR is actively exploring decentralized identity solutions, particularly zero-knowledge proofs (ZK-proofs), to ensure the safety of refugees crossing borders. The agency acknowledges the potential of blockchain technology and has already initiated a pilot project using USD Coin (USDC) stablecoin for swift financial assistance to Ukrainian refugees.
